description:
Jurach, Tacey & Quitiquit, PLC, is a full-service law firm in Richmond with a special focus on criminal and traffic defense. As former prosecutors, our attorneys possess a strong working knowledge of the intricacies of Virginia's criminal law. Both prosecuted a wide range of criminal and traffic offenses as assistant commonwealth attorneys. They gained the valuable firsthand experience that can only come from appearing in court day in and day out.

Now, our lawyers use this experience to zealously defend the rights of the accused.

Creative Legal Strategies In A Broad Range Of Legal Matters

You can turn to our firm for quality legal services at reasonable rates. We offer creative strategies that are always geared toward your best interests.

Our firm handles all types of traffic violations and criminal charges, including:

  • DUIs
  • Reckless driving
  • Driving without a license
  • Habitual traffic offenses
  • Leaving the scene of an accident
  • Drug crimes
  • Assault and battery
  • Gun crimes

We also represent out-of-state clients facing criminal or traffic violations in Virginia. In addition, our firm provides dedicated legal guidance in family law and personal injury matters.

Discuss Your Situation With An Experienced Attorney

To arrange a free initial consultation with one of our lawyers, please call 804-728-2274. We have multiple convenient office locations throughout Virginia.
